Message.Msg: Your "point" is as unworthy of direct comment as it is beneath contempt. Moving on, I am curious how many variants of echo2165's alias you post under. It's commendable that you want to emulate someone who seems to embody many good characteristics, however, impersonation is not the way to go about it. Moreover, each of those good characteristics seem are clearly out of reach of your limited mental and emotional range. You certainly cannot write, which strongly suggests that your thinking is less than clear as well. I doubt echo2165 is flattered by your craven attentions, and I hope you are not sufficiently deluded to believe that you are fooling anyone into thinking that you are him. That would make you worthy only of even further pity. You used to post as jon3retired, didn't you? I recognize the writing "style". Why don't you just go back to your original alias and act like a man instead of a foolish teenage girl who thinks she's clever?

Thank you for proving my point, and I am not surprised by your lack of interest. As I have stated before, this was a tragic and probably a very avoidable event where two people of color became involved in a confrontation that resulted in the death of one and the endless persecution of the other. But maybe, just maybe, the American justice system has been able to prove that justice is and should be blind to the emotions and prejudices of the race industry that seeks to divide us all. "In your heart you know he is right." The Frogg

Message.Msg: My 1st 2 months I got plenty of help fixing problems but that's not good service. This month everything was right the 1st time and I didn't need good service. Now get rid of uncle Sam.

Message.Title: No texting !
Message.Msg: 1. I'm not paying extra so someone else can use a cheaper method. 2. I never open them and I don't want the sender to think I might. When it comes to texting everyone (hackers) but me reads them. I'd rather you just started hollering out your window. 3. Don't sue me for your carpal tunnel problems.

Topic.Title: Stock Date of Record re: Dividend

Message.Msg: The key is ex-date which is 7/8. The best resource is dividend.com it place symbol into top section. Again, the key E X-Date so yes you will get the dividend. Read up on ex-date and it will explain. It used to confuse me.

Message.Msg: "T" is a great safe stock and look at the dividends! Allow them to re-invest. I compare "t" to a utility stock. Probably will not advance too much but it also won't drop very much. Got to love the dividends.

We don't always get the truth from the media. One of my favorite rants - the liberal controlled media, television news, newspapers, magazines, radio; all continue to show 12 year old Trayvon; NOT 17 year old Trayvon. In reality "little Trayvon" at the time of his death stood almost 6'2" tall and weighed 175 muscular pounds. He had numerous run-ins with authorities (both at school and local police), had been stopped and almost arrested two days before his death for smacking a bus driver in the face, because the driver refused to let him ride for free. He was released because the driver was told not to press charges by the bus company and to continue on his route. When "little Trayvon" was suspended at school it was not only because he tried to bring a little marijuana in with him, he was in possession of wedding rings and other jewelry, watches, etc. that he said he "found" along with a large screwdriver while on the way to school that day. The jewelry was turned over to the Police by the school. Thank God for the liberal media!
